items.sentence: Does this mean that you\'re not going to go to Boston?

There is a connection between smoking and lung cancer.
How can you be so certain you haven\'t made a mistake?
I can\'t believe Tom is really planning on doing that.
I didn\'t think Tom was capable of doing such a thing.
I don\'t know how you can work under these conditions.
I think it\'s strange that she was absent from school.
If you turn to the left, you\'ll see a white building.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to argue about this anymore.
